Text: Hendrix RegardsIn hopes that this email will be passed on my best wishes to you in dealing with what your are going through There is not a day that passes that I do not reflect on your burdens and wish for you the best Having suffered a few valleys to go with my peaks I appreciate probably only to a limited degree your struggle I am confident that things will improve for you certainly my hopes are for that I regret there is not more that I could do than offer my hopes and best wishes for you Dennis Hendrix
